title: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones offer the best in noise-canceling technology, providing a peaceful listening experience in any environment. Featuring Dual Noise Sensor technology and a powerful HD Noise-Canceling Processor QN1, these headphones deliver exceptional sound quality with high-resolution audio. The adaptive sound control adjusts the ambient sound settings to your activity, while the touch sensor controls allow you to pause/play/skip tracks, control volume, and answer phone calls effortlessly. With up to 30 hours of battery life, quick charging, and a comfortable over-ear design, the WH-1000XM4 headphones are perfect for long listening sessions. The Speak-to-Chat feature automatically pauses the music when you start talking, and the Multipoint Connection lets you pair two Bluetooth devices at the same time. These headphones also support voice assistants like Alexa and Google Assistant for hands-free control. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable fit for extended use, while the foldable structure makes them easy to carry. Enjoy crystal-clear audio with enhanced bass and immersive sound quality. Ideal for travelers, commuters, and audiophiles, the Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones redefine your listening experience.
key_features: Up to 30 hours of battery life
meta_title: Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones - Ultimate Listening Experience
meta_description: Buy Sony WH-1000XM4 Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones. Features Dual Noise Sensor, 30-hour battery life, and voice assistant support. Perfect for all environments.
